name: karma-vinyl-streams
description: Use gulp plugins instead of Karma preprocessors

scripts.test: mocha test/unit/*spec.js && karma start ./test/integration/karma.conf.js --single-run=true && karma start ./test/integration/karma.browserify.conf.js --single-run=true && karma start ./test/integration/karma.typescript.conf.js --single-run=true
scripts.cover: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- test/unit/*spec.js -u exports -R spec

author: Majid Burney <moocow@euphoricsoup.com>
